alert.note: Alert for Pembina (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 17 at 1:38PM CDT until further notice by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in North Dakota... Pembina River at Neche affecting Pembina County. .Ice jamming on the Pembina River near Neche is causing rapid rises on the river near Neche. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR AN ICE JAM REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and major flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pembina River at Neche. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 20.5 feet, MAJOR FLOOD. Railroad upstream of gage is overtopped. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:45 PM CDT Monday the stage was 18.6 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 12:45 PM CDT Monday was 18.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to 21.0 feet tomorrow. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
